resources.string: Rename TV
An app wants to make your TV visible to other Bluetooth devices for %1$d seconds.
An app wants to make your TV visible to other Bluetooth devices. You can change this later in Bluetooth settings.
An app wants to turn on Bluetooth and make your TV visible to other devices for %1$d seconds.
An app wants to turn on Bluetooth and make your TV visible to other devices. You can change this later in Bluetooth settings.
TV info
When you allow data roaming, you may incur significant roaming charges!\n\nThis setting affects all users on this TV.
Encrypt TV
Require a numeric PIN or password to decrypt your TV each time you power it on

You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. Once you encrypt your TV, you need to type a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you power it on. You can\'t decrypt your TV except by performing a factory data reset, erasing all your data.\n\nEncryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your TV plugged in until encryption is complete. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data.
Encrypt TV
The encryption operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you\'ll lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the TV will restart several times.
Wait while your TV is being encrypted. ^1% complete.

Encryption was interrupted and can\'t complete. As a result, the data on your TV is no longer accessible. \n\n To resume using your TV, you need to perform a factory reset. When you set up your TV after the reset, you\'ll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account.
%1$s will be disconnected from sharing this TV\'s Internet connection.
Allow data exchange when the TV touches another device
WARNING: You may incur extra carrier data charges.\n\nTV setup can require significant network activity.
WARNING: The TV won\'t be able to verify that your software is up to date.
The TV was unable to connect to this Wi-Fi network.
TV not docked
You need to dock the TV before setting up dock audio.
Play sound when inserting or removing TV from dock
Don\'t play sound when inserting or removing TV from dock
Switch orientation automatically when rotating TV
Switch orientation automatically when rotating TV
Require PIN to use TV
Require PIN to use TV

Status of the battery, network, and other information
MDN
Erases all data on TV

"This will erase all data from your TV's internal storage, including:


Your Google account

System and app data and settings

Downloaded apps"
Reset TV
Sharing this TV\'s Internet connection
Sharing this TV\'s Internet connection to 1 device
Sharing this TV\'s Internet connection to %1$d devices
Not sharing this TV\'s Internet connection
Let apps use GPS on your TV to pinpoint your location
About TV

Your TV and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by apps from unknown sources. You agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your TV or loss of data that may result from using these apps.
This app can access the following on your TV:
This app can access the following on your TV. In order to improve performance and reduce memory usage, some of these permissions are available to %1$s because it runs in the same process as %2$s:
Move to TV
If you stop this service, some features of your TV may stop working correctly until you power it off and then on again.
TV information
%1$s can collect all of the text you type, except passwords. This includes personal data such as credit card numbers. It can also collect data about your interactions with the TV.
TV idle
TV
Battery used when TV is idle
Removing this account will delete all of its messages, contacts, and other data from the TV!
This account is required by some apps. You can only remove it by resetting the TV to factory defaults (which deletes all your personal data) in Settings > Backup & reset.

Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your TV.

Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the TV to the web. A Google Account works this way.

To choose which kinds of information to sync within each account, go to Settings > Accounts.

Your mobile data connection will be disabled when the specified limit is reached.\n\nSince data usage is measured by your TV, and your carrier may account for usage differently, consider using a conservative limit.
If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won\'t work unless you\'re connected to a Wi-Fi network.\n\nThis setting affects all users on this TV.
%2$s: about %1$s used, as measured by your TV. Your carrier\'s data usage accounting may differ.
Only the TV\'s owner can manage users.
You will lose your space and data on this TV. You can\'t undo this action.
This user\'s space and data will disappear from this TV. You can\'t undo this action.
This setting affects all users on this TV.
